mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_role(id, name, code, created_by, is_active) VALUES(#{id}, #{name}, #{code}, #{createdBy}, #{isActive})
mapper.select: SELECT sr.id, sr.name, sr.code, sr.is_active AS isActive, mp.menu_id AS menuId FROM sys_role sr LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu_mapping mp ON mp.role_id = sr.id WHERE sr.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_role SET name = #{name}, is_active = #{isActive}, updated_at = now(), updated_by = #{updatedBy} WHERE id = #{id}
